newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Philippines cuts rate on 344-day special T-bills.
newsitem.headline: Philippines cuts rate on 344-day special T-bills.

text.p: The Philippine Central Bank said on Tuesday it had cut the interest rate on its 344-day special series Treasury bills to 10.3 percent from 10.4 percent.
The rate reduction came a day after average rates of Treasury bills slipped further in the weekly auction to 9.498 percent from 9.724 percent a week ago.
The Central Bank offers special series T-bills through an over-the-counter window.
The Central Bank did not change its overnight and term reverse repo rates.
